body:
Is there a delay on Gravatar, and updating it onto the forums?
If not, it no show ;-;
body_tagged:

title: Gravatar no register.

replies.body: Yep, there's a few minutes of delay, not an issue.
replies.body_tagged: Yep, there's a few minutes of delay, not an issue.

replies.body: Did you set it to rating G?
replies.body_tagged: Did you set it to rating G?

replies.body: It's been a few minutes and your picture didn't appear. Like 99 said, make sure the rating is G. Good luck! :D
replies.body_tagged: It's been a few minutes and your picture didn't appear. Like 99 said, make sure the rating is G. Good luck! :D

replies.body: Yep make the rating to G as the other guys said it :P Then just wait a couple of minutes, shouldn't take that long.
replies.body_tagged: Yep make the rating to G as the other guys said it :P Then just wait a couple of minutes, shouldn't take that long.

replies.body: Its G, ill wait then, ty :D
replies.body_tagged: Its G, ill wait then, ty :D

EDIT: Nvm, got em'

replies.body: Ami me tardó 24+ horas, fíjate bien que esté registrado con el mail que tienes en avicus, y si no te funciona trata de volver a poner la misma foto al gravatar y ponerle G no PG-13. si no te funciona debe ser el archivo de la foto. Suerte Cyclops!
replies.body_tagged: Ami me tardó 24+ horas, fíjate bien que esté registrado con el mail que tienes en avicus, y si no te funciona trata de volver a poner la misma foto al gravatar y ponerle G no PG-13. si no te funciona debe ser el archivo de la foto. Suerte Cyclops!

replies.body: Did you use caps when putting your email in your profile. Mine didn't work with caps. Soon as i made this change my profile pic updated instantly.
replies.body_tagged: Did you use caps when putting your email in your profile. Mine didn't work with caps. Soon as i made this change my profile pic updated instantly.

replies.body:
If your talking bout my avicus profile, it was caps.
I just changed it, ill wait till the morning for it to update then.
Thanks :D
